thread.title: Beyonce fan Twitter account appears to PREDICT superstar's surprise pregnancy - and much more
thread.title_full: Beyonce fan Twitter account appears to PREDICT superstar's surprise pregnancy - and much more

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Beyonce fan Twitter account appears to PREDICT superstar's surprise pregnancy - and much more
text:
Beyonce (Photo: Getty Images North America) Share   
A Beyonce fan Twitter account appeared to predict the superstar's surprise pregnancy announcement. 
The 35-year-old singer took to Instagram on Wednesday to announce she is expecting twins with her husband Jay Z. 
She wrote: "We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters (sic)" 
But while it took most of the world by surprise, it looks like one person knew the news was coming all along. 
Four days before the announcement, a Twitter user with the handle @beyoncefan666 wrote: "Beyonce is pregnant. She told me." 
But what's even more spooky is that the same fan tweeted all the way back in July 2016 saying Bey would make the big reveal in February 2017. 
And not only that, she also shared a post in June 2016 saying that Donald Trump would be elected President of the United States and that the UK would vote to leave the European Union. 
Then there's a tweet written in August 2016 about Lady Gaga releasing an album in October and that she would be performing at the Super Bowl half time show. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
